Diagnosis. Rostrum straight, reaching end of antennular peduncle, dorsal margin with 12 to 15 teeth equally distributed, first 3 or 4 teeth behind orbit, ventral margin with 3 or 4 teeth. Second pair of pereopods very unequal in size, but equal in shape, both pereopods bearing longitudinal row of spines.

Distribution. Western Atlantic Ocean: USA (North Carolina, Florida, Mississipi, Louisiana, Texas), Mexico , Guatemala , Nicaragua , Panama , Colombia , Venezuela , Guyana , Surinam , French Guyana , Brazil (Amapá, Pará, Piauí, Ceará, Rio Grande do Norte, Pernambuco, Alagoas, Sergipe, Bahia, Espírito Santo, Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Paraná, Santa Catarina, Rio Grande do Sul).
